question: How much does the issuance of the unemployment card for the year 2025 cost?
answer: It is provided free of charge.

question: I am an adult who is currently fulfilling military obligations, or i have not fullfilled them but i am an unemployed adult. Can I apply?
answer: No, all male adults who apply for the unemployment card must have not any military obligations ongoing.

question: What is the validity period of the unemployment card ?
answer: The card is valid from the date of issuance until 3 months duration period.

question: Is the issuance process of the transportation card for the disabled available digitally?
answer: Yes there is a digital form of the unemployment card available

question: Are there remote service points available so i can learn more about the drill?
answer: Yes, there are. You can visit https://mitos.gov.gr/index.php/%CE%94%CE%94:%CE%88%CE%BA%CE%B4%CE%BF%CF%83%CE%B7_%CE%B4%CE%B5%CE%BB%CF%84%CE%AF%CE%BF%CF%85_%CE%B1%CE%BD%CE%B5%CF%81%CE%B3%CE%AF%CE%B1%CF%82
